alert.note: Alert for Adair; Casey; Russell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 2:44PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Russell, south central Casey and east central Adair Counties through 330 PM EDT/230 PM CDT/... At 243 PM EDT/143 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Jamestown, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Russell, south central Casey and east central Adair Counties, including the following locations... Jabez, Sycamore Flat, Christine, Eli, Whittle, Windsor, Webbs Cross Roads, Royville, Sano and Russell Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
